For our final project at COOP careers, our cohort engaged as a team to provide insights to our client who provided a real dataset pertaining to media campaigns. As the financial analyst of the team, I focused on providing insights regarding cost-effectiveness of different mobile device makes and Designated Market Areas.

For device make analysis, the first step involved visualizing the entire range of makes. This included looking at the relevant KPIs from the available data.
![Unfiltered bar charts](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/99446021/288204887-43494a59-ce47-41f3-8224-c5bd572337d8.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QfkXtHoEJaxwtynRB1_4ykaHhizWMYwUvEZUhuCZnRc)


Because cost-effectiveness can be evaluated by identifying device makes that lead to conversions, I filtered the device makes to only those that involved conversions.
![Filtered](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/99446021/288209270-fda4d1d0-f54b-4761-a01c-754a0adad9bf.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..U7s4aBcxcBiQ5e_Hb48blRIPH2IfWTvuZD9Y-cU_1-I)

In addition to identifying promising device makes, I generated linear regressions between the KPIs obtained in order to identify top-performing device makes. These linear regressions also allow us to also make better-informed predictions about future advertising campaigns on the involved device makes.
![Regressions](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/99446021/288204442-81d1ab3d-d99c-4029-ab0a-d6bc3ee39612.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..YnAx3ZZYkCrkeoth-4af7tGyj1rvQdobWCaVAQVAd_E)

Similarly, we can conduct a similar type of analysis with Designated Marketing Areas. By filtering by conversion rate, we can obtain the top-performing states and their cities.
![DMA](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/99446021/288204571-ce13842a-a5a3-4fec-a4d6-5a596f1b346a.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..AaQ15-rZzlnzNbEcEuUsvb6ordCW_YDS0cKgovseEGw)

Similarly, I visualized these Key Performance Indicators with a Tableau dashboard which enables interactive viewing.
<iframe src="https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/victor.canta/viz/COOPClientProject/Dashboard1?:showVizHome=no&:embed=true" width="800" height="600" frameborder="0"></iframe>
